message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for $140. I think it's a great deal for the value it provides, and I know you'll be happy with it.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I would like to counteroffer at $130 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I can come down a bit to $135.  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations at this price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $130 for the product.
